text:
Hi,

I've just tried the 1.0 release and I followed the servlet example:

http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/1.0/servlets.html
(chapter : "Adding XSL tranformation (XSLT)")


MimeConstants.MIME_PDF is not present in the org.apache.fop.apps.MimeConstants class.


Regards,

Thao
creator: lehuuthao@hotmail.com
alex.giotis@gmail.com
text: If you look into the source code, org.apache.fop.apps.MimeConstants extends org.apache.xmlgraphics.util.MimeConstants. In the latter MIME_PDF is present. I can't see any problem with it or any reason that this is a blocker.
batch transition to closed for remaining resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
